google_play_reviews.content: Works well. A nice feature would be to have an option to store the scanned barcode numbers for "delayed transmission" to pc. - As it is now, the app device, the cd's, and the pc have to all be in the same location. Not too convenient if cd's are in one room and pc is in another. Just a suggestion.
I think that it would have been a better idea to work with the developers of the existing MusicBrainz app to incorporate the functionality that is made available here. Just my humble opinion......
google_play_reviews.replyContent: It was my original plan to add this to the official app, but as it was a rather specialized feature, which is a bit difficult to understand and use, I decided to implement it separately to see how it goes. I still consider submitting this to the official MB app. Another option would be to have a better integration between the two apps.
